title: Zeek - Detection
description: -   This dashboard provides insights for intel, notice, signatures, and traceroute.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard provides insights for intel, notice, signatures and traceroute.

## Widgets
1. Top Seen Indicators
2. Top Seen Indicators Type
3. Top Intel Sources where the Data was Discovered
4. File Mime Types
5. Intel Log Details
6. Total Raised Notice
7. Raised Notices Over Time
8. Transport Protocols
9. Types of Notice
10. Top Source Address
11. Notice by Actions
12. Top Remote Peer that raised the Notice
13. Top Emails who received Notice
14. Notice Log Details
15. Source Host by Port
16. Destination Host by Port
17. Signature Event by Notice
18. Signatures Log Details
19. Top 10 Address Initiating the Traceroute
20. Top 10 Destination Address of Traceroute
21. Protocol used for the traceroute
22. Traceroute Log Details

definition.title: Top Intel Sources where the Data was Discovered
Top Remote Peer that raised the Notice
